Hello This is Brandon

I have a new Jekyll site, and I’m learning the ropes.

What’s the point? Philosophical ramblings, wilderness survival training, knife making? Who knows, perhaps all of the above.

Here’s a table of things I do:

LifeWork
Make BeerWrite Code
Make KnivesRun Automations
Make Web AppsAttend Meetings
Ramble in the WoodsAvoid Attending Meetings

That about sums me up. This post will be deleted.

Through a curtain, brightly.

Notes on working without pants.
